languages.text: "Это ты так дал понять, что расстроился? Слушай, ведь можно просто сказать — "хреново мне", и все. Тебя так и поймут, и поддержать смогут".
"Is that your way of saying you're upset? Look, you can just say 'I feel bad' and have done with it. People will understand you and have a chance to offer you support."
languages.original_text: "Это ты так дал понять, что расстроился? Слушай, ведь можно просто сказать — "хреново мне", и все. Тебя так и поймут, и поддержать смогут".

traits.locale_text: "Is that your way of saying you're upset? Look, you can just say 'I feel bad' and have done with it. People will understand you and have a chance to offer you support."
"Is that your way of saying you're upset? Look, you can just say 'I feel bad' and have done with it. People will understand you and have a chance to offer you support."
"Is that your way of saying you're upset? Look, you can just say 'I feel bad' and have done with it. People will understand you and have a chance to offer you support."
"Is that your way of saying you're upset? Look, you can just say 'I feel bad' and have done with it. People will understand you and have a chance to offer you support."

languages.text: “你就是这样表达难过的吗？听着，你只要直接说‘我感觉很糟糕’就行了。所有人都会明白你的意思，借此机会鼓励你。”
languages.original_text: "Is that your way of saying you're upset? Look, you can just say 'I feel bad' and have done with it. People will understand you and have a chance to offer you support."

traits.locale_text: “你就是这样表达难过的吗？听着，你只要直接说‘我感觉很糟糕’就行了。所有人都会明白你的意思，借此机会鼓励你。”

languages.text: « C'est comme ça que vous faites comprendre que vous êtes contrarié ? Vous pourriez pas juste dire "ça fait chier", comme tout le monde ? Comme ça, au moins, les gens autour de vous peuvent vous comprendre et vous consoler. »
languages.original_text: "Is that your way of saying you're upset? Look, you can just say 'I feel bad' and have done with it. People will understand you and have a chance to offer you support."

traits.locale_text: « C'est comme ça que vous faites comprendre que vous êtes contrarié ? Vous pourriez pas juste dire "ça fait chier", comme tout le monde ? Comme ça, au moins, les gens autour de vous peuvent vous comprendre et vous consoler. »

languages.text: «¿Eso significa que te fastidia o algo? De verdad, puedes decir que te "sientes mal" por lo sucedido y acabamos antes. La gente entenderá tus palabras y podrá ofrecerte apoyo».
languages.original_text: "Is that your way of saying you're upset? Look, you can just say 'I feel bad' and have done with it. People will understand you and have a chance to offer you support."

traits.locale_text: «¿Eso significa que te fastidia o algo? De verdad, puedes decir que te "sientes mal" por lo sucedido y acabamos antes. La gente entenderá tus palabras y podrá ofrecerte apoyo».

languages.text: 「動揺をそうやって表現するの？ねえ、単に”気分が悪い”と言うだけよ。そしたら言ってることが伝わって、サポートを受けるチャンスだってあるのに」
languages.original_text: "Is that your way of saying you're upset? Look, you can just say 'I feel bad' and have done with it. People will understand you and have a chance to offer you support."

traits.locale_text: 「動揺をそうやって表現するの？ねえ、単に”気分が悪い”と言うだけよ。そしたら言ってることが伝わって、サポートを受けるチャンスだってあるのに」

languages.text: "Was soll das heißen? Dass Ihr aufgebracht seid? Sagt doch einfach 'mir geht es nicht gut' und fertig. Dann verstehen die Leute Euch und können ihre Hilfe anbieten."
languages.original_text: "Is that your way of saying you're upset? Look, you can just say 'I feel bad' and have done with it. People will understand you and have a chance to offer you support."

traits.locale_text: "Was soll das heißen? Dass Ihr aufgebracht seid? Sagt doch einfach 'mir geht es nicht gut' und fertig. Dann verstehen die Leute Euch und können ihre Hilfe anbieten."

languages.original_text: "Is that your way of saying you're upset? Look, you can just say 'I feel bad' and have done with it. People will understand you and have a chance to offer you support."

languages.text: "Böyle diyerek üzüntünü mü ifade ediyorsun? Yani, 'kendimi kötü hissediyorum' demen yeterli. İnsanlar seni anlayıp teselli etmeye çalışacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Is that your way of saying you're upset? Look, you can just say 'I feel bad' and have done with it. People will understand you and have a chance to offer you support."

traits.locale_text: "Böyle diyerek üzüntünü mü ifade ediyorsun? Yani, 'kendimi kötü hissediyorum' demen yeterli. İnsanlar seni anlayıp teselli etmeye çalışacaktır."
